title: PHPtime_sleep_until()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPtime_sleep_until()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Let the script sleep for 3 seconds:
<?php
time_sleep_until(time()+3);
echo "Hello";
?>

Definition and Usage
The time_sleep_until() function is used to make a script sleep until the specified time.
Syntax
time_sleep_until(
timestamp
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
timestamp
Required. Specifies when the script should wake
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns TRUE on success, or FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
5.1.0+
Changelog:
This function did not work on Windows platforms until PHP 5.3.0

★
+1
